name: ICC 858 Stain Remover/Degreaser™
description: ICC 858 Stain Remover/Degreaser™ is a three-in-one cleaner which degreases, removes stains and preps mesh. IOt removes any residual stain or ghosting, leaving your screen degreased, like new and ready to use again. Stencils adhere readily to mesh cleaned with 858.  Non-Caustic formula is safer to handle and easier on mesh than highly caustic solutions.  Renews hardened mesh with degreasing action as it removes all traces of stains.
